fields.label: Terms to Hide
fields.name: terms_to_hide
fields.instructions:
List all term IDs that need to be excluded from the filter options. If multiple, seperate with a comma. To find a taxonomy term’s ID, browse to the taxonomy edit screen. Hover over a term, then look for its tag_ID value in the browser window’s status bar at the bottom.

Example: If you wanted to prevent Grade 6 from appearing in the Teachers & Staff - High School page, in the Admin you would click Teachers & Staff/Grades and hover Grade 6. While hovering, look at the bottom left of your browser and in the url is tag_ID=115. The ID is 115 and you would enter 115 into this field.
